title: goAgain with String and int parameter

content.question: public String goAgain(String str, int index) { if (index >= str.length()) return str; return str + goAgain(str.substring(index), index + 1); } What is printed as a result of executing the following statement? System.out.println(goAgain("today", 1));

skill.text: 3.C: Determine the result or output based on code that contains procedural abstractions.
